"A Beautiful Mind" is a biographical drama about the life of John Nash, a brilliant mathematician who made groundbreaking discoveries early in his career. The movie tells the story of four young men from different backgrounds who are brought together by their participation in a group of teenagers that are believed to be involved in witchcraft.
Overall, both movies have impressive casts and compelling plots. "The Crucible" es una historia de drama basado en el obra de Arthur Miller de la misma nombre. La película cuenta la historia de cuatro joven hombres de diferentes orígenes que son llevados juntos por su participación en un grupo de jóvenes que se cree que están involucrados en magia.

In this movie, Newt Scamander (played by David Bradley) is a magizoologist traveling the world to research magical creatures as something mysterious leaves trails of destruction in the city, threatening to expose the wizarding world. His mission is to find and rescue magical creatures before it's too late.

The plot of this movie revolves around Newt Scamander's quest to find magical creatures and rescue them from those malicious beings who seek to destroy the wizarding world by leaving trails of destruction in the city, threatening to expose the wizarding world. 

Overall, I would highly recommend "Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them" to someone who enjoys fantasy movies with a strong focus on character development.
